questions.name: What is an event listener?
questions.solution: A function that waits for an event trigger

questions.name: Describe how a click event is processed.
questions.solution: The listener responds to the event and runs assigned logic.

questions.name: Design a simple event-driven workflow for submitting a form.
questions.solution: OnSubmit event validates data and sends it to the server.

questions.name: Which component allows selecting from a list?
Explain the purpose of layout managers.
questions.solution: They control arrangement and alignment of GUI components.

questions.name: Evaluate if a button should trigger synchronous or asynchronous actions.
questions.solution: Async is preferred for long processes to avoid blocking UI.
